item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "If God is an author and the universe is the biggest novel ever written, I may feel as if I'm the lead character in the story, but like every man and woman on Earth, I am a suporting player in one of billions of subplots. You know what happens to supporting players. Too often they are killed off in chapter 3, or in chapter 10, or in chapter 35. A supporting player always has to be looking over his shoulder." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Bill Bryson
item.description: "We used to build civilizations. Now we build shopping malls." -- Bill Bryson

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "Change isn't easy... changing the way you live means changing what you believe about life. That's hard... When we make our own misery, we sometimes cling to it even when we want so bad to change because the misery is something we know. The misery is comfortable." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't know the question, but sex is definitely the answer." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Love is the answer, but while you are waiting for the answer, sex raises some pretty good questions." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own." -- Robert A. Heinlein
